title: Dear You - Part 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Okay, let’s start filming. You guys ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Completely zura! You’re good too, right, Setsuna-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! I’ll go first!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Right now, I’m standing in the same place as Nozomi-san, Hanamaru-san, and the rest of everyone, all thanks to you who, together with Kasumi-san, revived the club. From the bottom of my heart, thank you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>From now on, so that I can realize my ambition…. to create a world overwhelming with love, please keep lending me your power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru heard a lot about how you got the Nijigaku’s idol club back on its feet from Setsuna-chan and the others. To have someone who has as much passion as you do support us is really reassuring<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru has ambition like Setsuna-chan too. Maru wants to do lots and lots of fun things with different people as a school idol! So keep helping us, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I think what I wanted to say was already covered by the other two. Fufu, I’m really grateful to you too, and I want you to continue to support me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>But with that, I want to support you the same amount you did for me. It would be nice if we can be in a mutually supportive relationship. Whenever you’re lost or worried, I also want to be lost or worried with you. We’ll always be together<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>My face burns hot after hearing your message, Nozomi-san….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>M-, me too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Is that so? I wonder if that person would be like that too when they see this message? I can’t wait to see their face~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
